meanings.definition: spivvier (adjective): characterized by flashy or ostentatious behavior
meanings.sent1: Her spivvier outfit caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The spivvier decorations at the event added a touch of glamour.
meanings.sent3: He always goes spivvier with his clothing on special occasions.
meanings.sent4: The spivvier car in the showroom gleamed under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The spivvier display in the store window was hard to miss.

meanings.definition: spivvier (noun): a person who dresses or behaves in a flashy or ostentatious manner
meanings.sent1: The spivvier stood out in the crowd with his bold attire.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office spivvier for her extravagant style.
meanings.sent3: The spivvier always turned heads with his flamboyant outfits.
meanings.sent4: The spivvier was the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent5: Everyone admired the confidence of the spivvier in the room.

meanings.definition: spivvier (verb): to dress or behave in a flashy or ostentatious manner
meanings.sent1: She decided to spivvier up for the gala to make a statement.
meanings.sent2: He always spivviers when he wants to impress his date.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to spivvier around the room, showing off its new collar.
meanings.sent4: The dancers spivviered across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The students spivviered for the school play, embracing the costumes.
